title: Cannot to use both layout and catchall at the same level
body:
I cannot use both a layout and a catchall route at the same level. For instance, this renders MyPage but not Layout:

```
      '/poc': {
        '*breadcrumbs': MyPage,
        layout: Layout,
      }
```
author: lmaccherone

comments.body:
Hey @lmaccherone thanks for reporting this!
I published a new version with the fix, should be good now

satisfaction_conditions: A fix that allows simultaneous use of layout and catchall routes at the same level
Proper rendering of both the Layout and MyPage components when configured together
Timely resolution through a version update
